text: 6:27 Matyu 3:17; Luk 3:22; Jon 1:33; 4:14; 6:48-58; Aposel 2:22; 2 Pita 1:17Ia dagher kuraghɨriba bagh ingar da inian markɨ. Ia dagher zurara ikia mamaghɨra itim bagh ingarɨva a inigh, kar dagher zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim anɨdim. Afeziam God kamaghɨn ian aka, Gumazamizibar Otarim, a uabɨn torogha gavgavim a ganɨngi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, dagher kam, Gumazamizibar Otarim ia danɨngam.”
